original: āśramasthaṃ sukhāsīnaṃ vedaśāstraviśāradam /

original: ṛṣayaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ

analyzed: yaiḥ yaiḥ vrataiḥ viśudhyanti tat naḥ brūhi mahā mune

original: yamaḥ
analyzed: yamaḥ

analyzed: amedhyena tu saṃspṛṣṭaḥ rātrau ahani vā dvijaḥ

original: gomūtrayāvakāhāro daśarātreṇa śudhyati // YSS_1.6 //
analyzed: go mūtra yāvaka āhāraḥ daśa rātreṇa śudhyati

analyzed: viṣa prapatana prāyāḥ śastra ghāta hatāḥ ca ye

original: navaite pratyavasitāḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ /

original: cāndrāyaṇena śudhyanti taptakṛcchradvayena vā // YSS_1.8 //
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇena śudhyanti taptakṛcchra dvayena vā

original: ubhayāvāsinaḥ pāpā ye śyāmaśabalācyutāḥ /

analyzed: aindavābhyām viśudhyanti dattvā dhenum tathā vṛṣam

original: gobrāhmaṇahataṃ dagdhvā mṛtam udbandhanena ca /

analyzed: kṛcchra abdam samprakurvīta parākaḥ moha saṃgamāt

analyzed: ekaike tu kṛte pāpe prāyaścittam viduḥ budhāḥ

analyzed: kāpālika anna bhoktṝṇām tad nārī gāminām tathā

analyzed: surā madya pāne kṛte go māṃsa bhakṣaṇe vā

original: taptakṛcchraparikliṣṭo mauñjīhomena śudhyati // YSS_1.15 //
analyzed: taptakṛcchra parikliṣṭaḥ mauñjī homena śudhyati

original: prāyaścitte 'vyavasite kartā yadi vipadyate /

analyzed: śuddhaḥ tat ahar eva asau ihaloke paratra ca

original: asaṃbhojyā apratigrāhyā asaṃpāṭhyā avivāhinaḥ /

original: pūyante tadvrate pūrṇe sarve te (')
analyzed: pūyante tad vrate pūrṇe sarve te

original: rikthabhāginaḥ // YSS_1.18 //
analyzed: rikthabhāginaḥ

analyzed: aśītiḥ yasya varṣāṇi bālaḥ vā api ūna ṣoḍaśaḥ

original: apūrṇaṣoḍaśābdasya caturvarṣādhikasya ca /

analyzed: prāyaścittam caret bhrātā pitā vā anyaḥ pi bāndhavaḥ

original: ato bālatarasyāsya nāparādho na pātakaṃ /

analyzed: rāja daṇḍaḥ na tasya asti prāyaścittam ca na iṣyate

original: sūtaṃ hatvātikṛcchraṃ tu kuṇḍagolakam eva ca // YSS_1.22 //

analyzed: hatvā gām kṣatriyam vaiśyam śūdram vā api anuloma jam

original: eṣāṃ bhuktvā striyo gatvā tathaiva pratigṛhya ca /

original: kṛcchrābdam abdakṛcchraṃ vā śuddhyarthaṃ samyag ācaret // YSS_1.23A //

analyzed: anya prāṇi layam kurvan dadyāt śaktyā ca dakṣiṇām

original: mahāpātakakartāraś catvāro 'py aviśeṣataḥ /

original: rahasyakāriṇas tv ete māghamāse tu pauruṣam /

analyzed: kaivartaḥ ca eva śailūṣaḥ mallaḥ ca antyāvasāyinaḥ

analyzed: āsye ca maithunam kṛtvā taptakṛcchram samācaret

analyzed: pare pare lobha hatāḥ tatas tu parāvaraḥ ca eva pare pare ca

original: dharmārthakāmapratipattihetor yadi pravṛttau na paropatāpe // YSS_1.46 //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma pratipatti hetoḥ yadi pravṛttau na para upatāpe

original: yo vartate yasya narasya citte jñeyas sahāyas tu sukhāsukheṣu // YSS_1.49 //

original: yad yaddhi jātir dvijavargajātyā yāgādikam pāpakṛto na daṇḍyāḥ /
analyzed: yat yat hi jātiḥ dvijavarga jātyā yāga ādikam pāpa kṛtaḥ na daṇḍyāḥ

original: grahapradāneṣu niruddhabaddhāḥ sarpā na hiṃsanti parair abhītāḥ // YSS_1.51 //
analyzed: graha pradāneṣu niruddha baddhāḥ sarpāḥ na hiṃsanti paraiḥ abhītāḥ

original: taṃ dāpayitvā dhanine nṛpeṇa tatsvāminaḥ prāṇidhanair vimucyaḥ // YSS_1.52 //
analyzed: tam dāpayitvā dhanine nṛpeṇa tad svāminaḥ prāṇi dhanaiḥ vimucyaḥ

original: dharmārthavādeṣu gavādayo hi svecchāpramādād yadi te mriyante /
analyzed: dharma artha vādeṣu gavā ādayaḥ hi sva icchā pramādāt yadi te mriyante

original: tatrāpi doṣañ ca paśupramāṇaṃ nācakṣate dharmavidas tathaiva // YSS_1.53 //
analyzed: tatra api doṣam ca paśu pramāṇam na ācakṣate dharma vidaḥ tathā eva

original: āraṇyakā ye yadi daṃṣṭriṇas tu gāvo mriyante yadi tā adagdhāḥ /
analyzed: āraṇyakāḥ ye yadi daṃṣṭriṇaḥ tu gāvaḥ mriyante yadi tāḥ a dagdhāḥ

original: pāpān niroddhuṃ na ca pāśadātuḥ dhārāsvahastaṃ pravadanti pāpaṃ // YSS_1.54 //
analyzed: pāpān niroddhum na ca pāśa dātuḥ dhārāsu ahastam pravadanti pāpam

original: eko hato yo bahubhiḥ sametaiḥ na jñāyate kasya mṛtopaghātaiḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ hataḥ yaḥ bahubhiḥ sametaiḥ na jñāyate kasya mṛta upaghātaiḥ

original: divyena teṣām upalabhya hantā nivartanīyo nṛpasaṃniyuktaiḥ // YSS_1.55 //
analyzed: divyena teṣām upalabhya hantā nivartanīyaḥ nṛpa saṃniyuktaiḥ

original: saṃtyaktajīvo mriyate kadācid niṣpāpakaḥ pātakaśuddhikāryāt // YSS_1.55A //
analyzed: saṃtyakta jīvaḥ mriyate kadācid niṣpāpakaḥ pātaka śuddhi kāryāt

original: tarkapramāṇaiḥ pratitarkayitvā kecid vadanty evam idaṃ pramānam /
analyzed: tarka pramāṇaiḥ pratitarkayitvā kecid vadanti evam idam pramānam

original: nityāntajīvo mriyate kadācid vedaiś ca pṛṣṭair ṛṣibhiś ca gītaṃ // YSS_1.56 //
analyzed: nitya anta jīvaḥ mriyate kadācid vedaiḥ ca pṛṣṭaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ ca gītam

original: cāndrāyaṇādīni hi pāvanāni pāpā yad icchanti hitāya kartum /
analyzed: cāndrāyaṇa ādīni hi pāvanāni pāpāḥ yat icchanti hitāya kartum

original: saṃsargam icchanti phalaṃ tathā syāt jñānapradīpena tamo 'ndhakāre // YSS_1.57 //
analyzed: saṃsargam icchanti phalam tathā syāt jñāna pradīpena tamaḥ ndhakāre

original: prāyaścittīyatāṃ prāpya ye narās tv akṛtavratāḥ /
analyzed: prāyaścittīyatām prāpya ye narāḥ tu a kṛtavratāḥ

original: teṣāṃ daṇḍaṃ vratañ cāpi kramaśaś coditaṃ śṛṇu // YSS_2.1 //
analyzed: teṣām daṇḍam vratam ca api kramaśas ca uditam śṛṇu

original: svayam eva tu yaḥ pāpaṃ nivedya vratam ācaret /
analyzed: svayam eva tu yaḥ pāpam nivedya vratam ācaret

original: tasmin damo na prayojyo vrataṃ daṇḍaś ca gṛhyate // YSS_2.2 //
analyzed: tasmin damaḥ na prayojyaḥ vratam daṇḍaḥ ca gṛhyate

original: na pātake 'rtthadaṇḍo 'sti tulyadoṣe vidaṇḍanam /
analyzed: na pātake tulya doṣe vidaṇḍanam

original: tatra vratam akurvāṇaṃ sahasraṃ dāpayed damaṃ // YSS_2.3 //
analyzed: tatra vratam akurvāṇam sahasram dāpayet damam

original: upapātakayukto yo mānavo nācared vrataṃ /
analyzed: upapātaka yuktaḥ yaḥ mānavaḥ na ācaret vratam

original: sadāpy asāhasaṃ pūrvaṃ prāyaścittaṃ viśodhanaṃ // YSS_2.4 //
analyzed: sadā api asāhasam pūrvam prāyaścittam viśodhanam

original: cāṣamaṇḍūkamārjāra- godholūkāṃś ca vāyasān /
analyzed: cāṣa maṇḍūka mārjāra godhā ulūkān ca vāyasān

original: hatvā śatam avāpnoti vipro nakulam eva hi // YSS_2.5 //
analyzed: hatvā śatam avāpnoti vipraḥ nakulam eva hi

original: mayūrahaṃsabhāsāñ ca tathā śyenaṃś ca kukkuṭaṃ /
analyzed: mayūra haṃsa bhāsām ca tathā śyenan ca kukkuṭam

original: triṃśat paṇam avāpnoti tathaiva vanabarhiṇaṃ // YSS_2.6 //
analyzed: triṃśat paṇam avāpnoti tathā eva vana barhiṇam

original: vipram agniparityaktaṃ saṃdhyopāsanavarjitaṃ /
analyzed: vipram agni parityaktam saṃdhyā upāsana varjitam

original: śūdrapreṣyakarañ caiva rājā rāṣṭrāt pravāsayet // YSS_2.7 //
analyzed: śūdra preṣya karam ca eva rājā rāṣṭrāt pravāsayet

original: utsṛṣṭāgnis tu yo vipras tv asnāto 'mantrato 'pi vā /
analyzed: utsṛṣṭa agniḥ tu yaḥ vipraḥ tu a snātaḥ vā

original: upasthānārcano sūryaṃ sandhyāṃ nopāsate dvijaḥ // YSS_2.8 //
analyzed: sūryam sandhyām na upāsate dvijaḥ

original: akartā nityayajñānāṃ bhuñjāno vṛṣalāśanaṃ /
analyzed: akartā nitya yajñānām bhuñjānaḥ vṛṣala aśanam

original: jīvamāno 'pi vā śastraiḥ pratyahaṃ paṇam āpnuyāt // YSS_2.9 //
analyzed: jīvamānaḥ u pi vā śastraiḥ pratyaham paṇam āpnuyāt

original: śūdrāsu śuklasektāraṃ vṛṣalāyāṃ ca vāñchakaṃ /
analyzed: śūdrāsu śukla sektāram vṛṣalāyām ca vāñchakam

original: vipraṃ sarvasvam ādāya lalāṭe bhagam aṅkayet // YSS_2.10 //
analyzed: vipram sarva svam ādāya lalāṭe bhagam aṅkayet

original: bhagacihnaṃ madyacihnaṃ surācihnaṃ lalāṭake /
analyzed: bhaga cihnam madya cihnam surā cihnam lalāṭake

original: veśyāsu śuklasektāraṃ sarvam ādāya bhūmipaḥ // YSS_2.11 //
analyzed: veśyāsu śukla sektāram sarvam ādāya bhūmipaḥ

original: apasnāto divāsnātaḥ parānnam api vātmanaḥ /
analyzed: apasnātaḥ divāsnātaḥ para annam api vā ātmanaḥ

original: bhoktā naṣṭakriyas tasya rājñaḥ svārtthaṃ pracakṣate // YSS_2.12 //
analyzed: bhoktā naṣṭa kriyaḥ tasya rājñaḥ sva arttham pracakṣate

original: viprasyoktaparityaktaṃ vṛṣalāśanasevinaḥ /
analyzed: viprasya ukta parityaktam vṛṣala aśana sevinaḥ

original: parītaṃ vottaraṃ vāsaḥ adharmadaṇḍasāhasaṃ /

original: striyam eva prakurvāṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ dāpayed damaṃ // YSS_2.14 //
analyzed: striyam eva prakurvāṇam dviguṇam dāpayet damam

original: bālāndharogivṛddhānāṃ na tu daṇḍo vidhīyate /
analyzed: bāla andha rogi vṛddhānām na tu daṇḍaḥ vidhīyate

original: visṛjya tu naro mūtraṃ rathyādau doṣam āpnuyāt // YSS_2.15 //
analyzed: visṛjya tu naraḥ mūtram rathyā ādau doṣam āpnuyāt

original: tathā purīṣam uddiṣṭaṃ chardiś ca na bhavet pathi /
analyzed: tathā purīṣam uddiṣṭam chardiḥ ca na bhavet pathi

original: dviguṇaṃ daṇḍam āpnoti mūtraṃ sthitvā samutsṛjet // YSS_2.16 //
analyzed: dviguṇam daṇḍam āpnoti mūtram sthitvā samutsṛjet

original: māhendrīṃ vāruṇīñ cāpi diśaṃ vīkṣya tu mūtrayan /
analyzed: māhendrīm vāruṇīm ca api diśam vīkṣya tu mūtrayan

original: purīṣaṃś ca tathā muñcan daṇḍaṃ dviguṇam āvahet // YSS_2.17 //
analyzed: purīṣan ca tathā muñcan daṇḍam dviguṇam āvahet

original: stenaḥ piśunavaktā ca sāhasī vṛṣalīpatiḥ /
analyzed: stenaḥ piśuna vaktā ca sāhasī vṛṣalī patiḥ

analyzed: visṛṣṭvā anuparīkṣya etān rājā rāṣṭreṣu kaṇṭakān

original: anutsṛṣṭā hi lokasya tv anṛtaṃ kurvate tamaḥ // YSS_2.19 //
analyzed: an utsṛṣṭāḥ hi lokasya tu anṛtam kurvate tamaḥ

analyzed: viṣṭa ādi pūrṇa saṃkṣiptam rakta mālya vibhūṣitam

original: śvapadādi mukhe nyasya pariyāpya kharājinaṃ /

analyzed: piśunam kharam āropya hṛta vittam vivāsayet

analyzed: hṛdayam viṣṭhayā liptam vṛṣalī patim utsṛjet

analyzed: vikretā tad samam dāpyaḥ dadyāt tasya api miśritam

analyzed: anvaṣṭakām aṣṭakām vā bhuñjānaḥ vṛṣalī pateḥ

original: paṇāñ caturdaśāpnoti tathā bhoktā ca māsikaṃ // YSS_2.50 //
analyzed: paṇām caturdaśa āpnoti tathā bhoktā ca māsikam

original: kramam apy aṣṭakādeśāt gṛhṇāno vṛṣalālayāt /
analyzed: kramam api aṣṭakā deśāt gṛhṇānaḥ vṛṣala ālayāt

original: ṣaṇṇavatyarddham āpnoti bhuktvā pūrvaṃ tu tadgṛhe // YSS_2.51 //
analyzed: ṣaṇṇavati arddham āpnoti bhuktvā pūrvam tu tad gṛhe

original: madyādīnāṃ tv abhakṣyāṇāṃ vipraḥ prāpnoti ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: madya ādīnām tu abhakṣyāṇām vipraḥ prāpnoti ṣoḍaśa

original: dviguṇaṃ pratipīḍānāṃ matsyānāṃ āpnuyāc chataṃ // YSS_2.52 //
analyzed: dviguṇam pratipīḍānām matsyānām āpnuyāt śatam

original: evaṃ dviguṇatāṃ dadyāt doṣeṣv eteṣu somapāḥ /
analyzed: evam dviguṇa tām dadyāt doṣeṣu eteṣu soma pāḥ

original: kharāśvasūkarādīnaṃ bhakṣaṇe patitaḥ smṛtaḥ // YSS_2.53 //
analyzed: khara aśva sūkara ādīnam bhakṣaṇe patitaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: dārvasthiśṛṅgapāṣāṇair yas tu bhāryābhṛtiṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: dāru asthi śṛṅga pāṣāṇaiḥ yaḥ tu bhāryā ābhṛtim dvijaḥ

original: sahasraṃ damam āpnoti kurvāṇo vapanaṃ yadi // YSS_2.54 //
analyzed: sahasram damam āpnoti kurvāṇaḥ vapanam yadi

original: aṅgeṣu vyaktadeśeṣu yo jāyāṃ karajair vraṇaṃ /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu vyakta deśeṣu yaḥ jāyām karajaiḥ vraṇam

original: kartā kārayitā svāṅgair dāpyaḥ syāt prathamaṃ damaṃ // YSS_2.55 //
analyzed: kartā kārayitā sva aṅgaiḥ dāpyaḥ syāt prathamam damam

original: yoṣitmukhaṃ tu bhuñjāno pītvā vāpidadaṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: yoṣit mukham tu pītvā dvijaḥ

original: tathā bhojayitā svaṃ vā dāpyaḥ syāt pūrvasāhasaṃ // YSS_2.56 //
analyzed: tathā bhojayitā svam vā dāpyaḥ syāt pūrvasāhasam

original: atyarthaṃ vedayaṃś caiva brāhmaṇaḥ patito bhavet /
analyzed: atyartham vedayan ca eva brāhmaṇaḥ patitaḥ bhavet

original: striyaṃ tathāśvavad gacchamś cuṃbayan guhyam eva vā // YSS_2.57 //
analyzed: striyam tathā aśva vat cuṃbayan guhyam eva vā

original: prayatnāc chuklam utsṛjya vipraḥ pañcāśad āpnuyāt /
analyzed: prayatnāt śuklam utsṛjya vipraḥ pañcāśat āpnuyāt

original: maithunaṃ goṣu gatvā tu tathā dāpyo bhavec chataṃ // YSS_2.58 //
analyzed: maithunam goṣu gatvā tu tathā dāpyaḥ bhavet śatam

original: gacchaṃs tathājayonau tu prāpyate pūrvasāhasaṃ /
analyzed: gacchan tathā aja yonau tu prāpyate pūrvasāhasam

original: madhyamaṃ daṇḍam āpnoti vrajan māhiṣayoniṣu // YSS_2.59 //
analyzed: madhyamam daṇḍam āpnoti vrajan māhiṣa yoniṣu

original: sahasraṃ damam āpnoti yonyāṃ goṣu naro vrajet /
analyzed: sahasram damam āpnoti yonyām goṣu naraḥ vrajet

original: evam eva dviguṇitā bhavanti vratacāriṣu // YSS_2.60 //
analyzed: evam eva dvi guṇitāḥ bhavanti vrata cāriṣu

original: pathi śrāntāya tulyāya panthā deyo 'thavāśramaṃ /
analyzed: pathi śrāntāya tulyāya panthāḥ deyaḥ

original: yamadātur bhaven meṣo 'deśadātāpratiśrayaḥ // YSS_2.61 //
analyzed: yama dātuḥ bhavet meṣaḥ deśa dātā a pratiśrayaḥ

original: śūdrāṃ tu sevamānād dhi vipraḥ śūdrāvaraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śūdrām tu sevamānāt hi vipraḥ śūdrā avaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: gatopagamanād eva śūdrāyāṃ patito bhavet // YSS_2.62 //
analyzed: gatopagamanāt eva śūdrāyām patitaḥ bhavet

original: gamanād eva śūdrāyāṃ tv apatyaṃ tanmayo dvijaḥ /
analyzed: gamanāt eva śūdrāyām tu apatyam tad mayaḥ dvijaḥ

original: mātā tu tasya śūdrasya pātityaṃ tu pracakṣate // YSS_2.63 //
analyzed: mātā tu tasya śūdrasya pātityam tu pracakṣate

original: tasmāc chūdras tu yajñārthaṃ gṛhyārtham api vā dvijaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śūdraḥ tu yajña artham gṛhya artham api vā dvijaḥ

original: śuklasektari kṛṣṇāyāṃ vipro 'gnihā pratīkṣate // YSS_2.64 //
analyzed: śukla sektari kṛṣṇāyām vipraḥ agni hā pratīkṣate

original: dṛṣṭvāpatyaṃ tu śūdrāyāṃ prayānti tv āpadaṃ mahat /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā apatyam tu śūdrāyām prayānti tu āpadam mahat

original: viśo vittaṃ nayād .. svayaṃ vā na dvijo yadi // YSS_2.65 //
analyzed: viśaḥ vittam nayāt svayam vā na dvijaḥ yadi

original: [two akṣaras indiscernible]
analyzed: two akṣaras indiscernible

original: śūnām api aśuddhānām ajadantaṃ suśobhanaṃ /
analyzed: api aśuddhānām su śobhanam

original: śūdrāgāmī dvijaḥ paśyet pitṝṇāṃ taṃ parīkṣyati // YSS_2.66 //
analyzed: śūdrā gāmī dvijaḥ paśyet pitṝṇām tam parīkṣyati

original: tasmād avaśyaṃ śrāddheṣu vipraṃ tu vṛṣalīpatiṃ /
analyzed: tasmāt avaśyam śrāddheṣu vipram tu vṛṣalī patim

original: śunaś cāpi tiraskṛtya brāhmaṇān āśayed dvijaḥ // YSS_2.67 //
analyzed: śunaḥ ca api tiraskṛtya brāhmaṇān āśayet dvijaḥ

original: vṛṣaḷīpatinā spṛṣṭam īkṣitaṃ bhuktamiśritaṃ /
analyzed: vṛṣaḷī patinā spṛṣṭam īkṣitam bhukta miśritam

original: sarvam annam abhojyaṃ syāt siddham annam idaṃ punaḥ // YSS_2.68 //
analyzed: sarvam annam abhojyam syāt siddham annam idam punar

original: apāṅktyānāṃ tv akalyāṇāṃ paṅktau tulyo 'pi ca dvijaḥ /
analyzed: apāṅktyānām tu akalyāṇām paṅktau ca dvijaḥ

original: sasyaṃ vṛddhaṃ samādadyāt paṅkeṣu vṛṣalīpatiḥ // YSS_2.69 //
analyzed: sasyam vṛddham samādadyāt paṅkeṣu vṛṣalī patiḥ

original: janakaṃ śuḷbasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ rajatena tathaiva ca /
analyzed: janakam śuḷba saṃspṛṣṭam rajatena tathā eva ca

original: śakyaṃ śodhayituṃ prājñaiḥ śrāddhe spṛṣṭaṃ vinaśyati // YSS_2.70 //
analyzed: śakyam śodhayitum prājñaiḥ śrāddhe spṛṣṭam vinaśyati

original: vipraḥ kṣatriyayā spṛṣṭas tathaivaṃ vaiśyayoṣitā /
analyzed: vipraḥ kṣatriyayā spṛṣṭaḥ tathā evam vaiśya yoṣitā

original: upāyaiś śuddhim āyāti na tu śūdrāṅganāṃ gataḥ // YSS_2.71 //
analyzed: upāyaiḥ śuddhim āyāti na tu śūdrā aṅganām gataḥ

original: upekṣako yo rājā tu grāme vā vṛṣaḷīpatiṃ /
analyzed: upekṣakaḥ yaḥ rājā tu grāme vā vṛṣaḷīpatim

original: sa rājāsatpratigrāhyaḥ svārthabhyo grāma eva tu // YSS_2.72 //
analyzed: sa rājā asat pratigrāhyaḥ sva arthabhyaḥ grāmaḥ eva tu

original: kaṇṭakānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ balabhṛto hi sāhasī /
analyzed: kaṇṭakānām tu sarveṣām bala bhṛtaḥ hi sāhasī

original: tasmāt sāhasino rājā bhraṃśadaṇḍam prakalpayet // YSS_2.73 //
analyzed: tasmāt sāhasinaḥ rājā bhraṃśa daṇḍam prakalpayet

original: svalpasāhasakarttā yaḥ kālād āyakasāhasī /
analyzed: su alpa sāhasa karttā yaḥ kālāt āyakasāhasī

original: atha bhavaty eva pāpam iti saṃcintya daṇḍayet // YSS_2.74 //
analyzed: atha bhavati eva pāpam iti saṃcintya daṇḍayet

original: evaṃ pañca viśād rājā kaṇṭakānāṃ samuddharet /
analyzed: evam pañca viśāt rājā kaṇṭakānām samuddharet

original: dharmam arthaṃ tathāyuṣyaṃ yaśo rāṣṭraṃ ca varddhate // YSS_2.75 //
analyzed: dharmam artham tathā āyuṣyam yaśaḥ rāṣṭram ca varddhate

original: kaṇṭakānāṃ tu kathitaṃ nyāyena prathamena yaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭakānām tu kathitam nyāyena prathamena yaḥ

original: caturvidhā kriyā proktā saṃsidhyati ca mārgataḥ // YSS_2.76 //
analyzed: caturvidhā kriyā proktā saṃsidhyati ca mārgataḥ

original: kulādayo vivādasya śravaṇe 'dhikṛtāgamāt /
analyzed: kula ādayaḥ vivādasya śravaṇe dhi kṛta āgamāt

original: koṇe 'py adhigatā śāstrair brāhmaṇena vipaścitā // YSS_2.77 //
analyzed: koṇe pi adhigatā śāstraiḥ brāhmaṇena vipaścitā
